channel.title: WDFARadio IPAWSCAP RSS Alert Feed
channel.description: FEMA's Integrated Public Alert Warning System in an RSS feed, brought to you by WDFARadio.com.

item.title: Administrative Message
item.description: A Silver Alert has been issued for the State of Arizona. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. The Chandler Police Department is looking for Carol Trapuzzano, age 83. Carol is a white female, approximately 5 feet, 3 inches tall, and 110 pounds, with blue eyes and gray hair. Carol departed her residence in the area of the 2500 block of West Orchid Lane in Chandler, at approximately 8:00pm on September 29th. She left in her silver in color, 2010 Ford Fusion 4 door sedan, displaying an Arizona license plate of, A, H, M, 5, 6, 1, 8, and has yet to return. Carol suffers from dementia which may make her confused or disoriented.

item.title: Local Area Emergency
item.description: BCSO believes Billy Joe Gray is missing and may be in danger because of his medical issues. If you have seen or spoken to Billy Joe Gray since Wednesday night, please call dispatch at 865-983-3620.
